setting: The Castle of Whispering Shadows is an abandoned fortress shrouded in mystery and legend. It is said that the castle holds the secret to an ancient power, hidden within its dilapidated walls. The player, an adventurer and a scholar of ancient histories, ventures into the castle to uncover the truth behind these legends. The halls echo with the voices of ghostly figures, each one guarding a piece of the puzzle that reveals the castle's origins and the fate of its former inhabitants.
mystery: The player must solve the mystery of why the Castle of Whispering Shadows fell into ruin and what happened to the royal family that once ruled there. The castle's former occupants were involved in a secret alchemical experiment aimed at unlocking the secret of immortality. Each character provides a fragment of the truth, leading to the final revelation of an alchemical vault containing the formula for the elixir of life.
final_prize: The Elixir of Life, an ancient formula said to grant immortality and the true secret behind the castle's mysteries, contained within an enchanted vial guarded by a specter of the past.

character.name: Elden the Scribe
character.role: The royal chronicler who documented the king's alchemical pursuits.
character.key_interaction: The player needs to answer Elden's riddles about the castle's past, proving their knowledge and respect for history.

character.name: Lady Mirra
character.role: The king's advisor, who warned against the experiment.
character.key_interaction: The player must convince Lady Mirra that they have noble intentions by recounting Elden's tales responsibly.

character.name: Sir Reginald
character.role: The captain of the guard loyal to the royal family.
character.key_interaction: They must demonstrate courage and honesty, reflecting on Lady Mirra's wisdom, to gain his trust and the key.

character.name: Marissa the Alchemist
character.role: The architect of the immortality experiment.
character.key_interaction: The player needs to discuss the balance of wisdom and ambition, referencing knowledge from prior rooms, to earn her cooperation.

character.name: King Lorien
character.role: The last king of the castle, who vanished under mysterious circumstances.
character.key_interaction: The player must piece together the narrative, reconciling truths and myths heard from previous encounters to put the king's spirit at peace and unlock the final prize.
